justification: Vendor 3 provides clear evidence of extensive OT and IoT integration ('extensive OT and IoT integration capabilities'), supports standard protocols (Modbus, OPC UA, BACnet, MQTT, AMQP), and demonstrates secure, real-time data acquisition into Digital Twin systems.
